msg: [JIRA]OJB-32 -- Fix that allows for the MtoNCollectionPrefetcher to respect the orderby's for a collection descriptor.

author: mkalen
msg: Fix encoding declaration in XML PI

author: arminw
msg: make handling of OJB in managed environments more flexible, introduce methods is/setManaged in PBImpl. Now the ConnectionManager can decide (using the new 'managed' flag) when it's allowed to change the autoCommit state and to commit/rollback a connection (in managed environment it's not allowed to do this). A specific ConnectionFactory implementation (ConnectionFactoryManagedImpl) is no longer needed

author: arminw
msg: fix cache synchronization issue when use OJB in managed environment with ObjectCacheDefaultImpl
